Why would I use fim-k8s?

To pass your audits in a brave new world using a familiar, undefeatable solution.

In more words…

At the time of creating this product, there weren’t any other solutions out there. We designed the architecture around common Linux kernel functionality to ensure well-known practices around inode monitoring. The rest of which was making sure it performed well in a clustered environment, and had features that security folks and auditors could healthily engage.
